stem: The sciatic nerve divides into two major branches. Which branch innervates the posterior compartment of the leg and intrinsic plantar foot muscles?
rationale_correct: The tibial nerve (terminal branch of sciatic) supplies posterior leg and plantar foot.

rationale_distractors.A: Deep fibular supplies anterior leg and dorsum web space sensation.
rationale_distractors.D: Sural is sensory to posterolateral leg and lateral foot.

evidence.citation: Heck C. Lower Limb Overview Handout â€” Sciatic branches overview. Jun 16, 2025.
